original_text: Many people also came into Jerusalem from the small towns near the city. They brought their sick friends with them. Some of those sick people had bad spirits that gave them trouble. God caused all these sick people to become well again.
korean_text: 예루살렘 부근의 수많은 사람들도 모여 병든 사람과 더러운 귀신에게 괴로움 받는 사람을 데리고 와서 다 나음을 얻으니라

sentences.original_text: Many people also came into Jerusalem
from the small towns near the city
They brought their sick friends with them
Some of those sick people had bad spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아픈 사람들 중 일부는 나쁜 영들을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: God caused all these sick people to become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이 모든 아픈 사람들이 다시 나아지게 하셨습니다
